attributes.action: Wicca to be made a recognised and legal religion
attributes.additional_details: To have the goverment make Wicca a fuly recogised and fully legal religion of the UK. This is to include our various festivals and rites including our Handfasting (wedding), Requiems (funerals), Blessings (naming ceramony). And for any Teples to have a charity status like all other religious buildings.
